channel.title: webgl on R gems and collection of erroRs

item.title: Create quick 3D maps in R with g3r package
item.description: library(g3r) ## Warning: replacing previous import 'vctrs::data_frame' by 'tibble::data_frame' ## when loading 'dplyr' # grand canyon g3r(lat = 36.2058, lon = -112.4413, alpha = TRUE, mapbox_token = MAPBOX_TOKEN) %>% g3r_camera(.5,.5,1) {"x":{"threegeo":{"tokenMapbox":"pk.eyJ1IjoiZHVycmFuaXUiLCJhIjoiY2p0Z21lazZqMDBjODQ5b2RrOXFwcHI5ZCJ9._DooiSrHiPv1bWhnTdMI1Q","unitsSide":1},"lat":36.2058,"lon":-112.4413,"radius":5,"zoom":12,"alpha":true,"backgroundColor":"0xffffff","backgroundAlpha":0,"camera":{"lat":0.5,"lon":0.5,"elevation":1}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
